metadata.title: Custom Websites & Web Apps for Small Businesses
metadata.description: We build affordable, professional websites for small businesses. WordPress, simple apps, or custom sites — everything you need to grow online fast.

hero.title: We build amazing <websites>websites</websites> for small businesses
hero.subtitle: With us you can build a modern website at an affordable price

about.title: How we help small businesses and entrepreneurs get an affordable website
about.body:
We are a team of experienced web developers helping small businesses, startups and entrepreneurs to create corporate websites, web apps, wordpress websites and any custom digital solution that fit your needs. From creating a website for your business to improving an existing one, we handle domains, hosting, designs, and all technical stuff so you don't have to!

Whether you need a one-page site, a personal brand presence, or a custom solution, we deliver affordable business websites that look professional, work fast, and grow with you.

No coding required — just your ideas and our expertise to bring your next online project to life.

services.title: What do we <keyword>offer</keyword> to your business?
services.subtitle: Services accessible to all our customers

static.title: Static Websites
static.body: Custom websites with static content, ideal for small companies and entrepreneurs that wants to make a simple website like a corporate website or an static portfolio. These sites are affordable, fast and efficient for stable content that doesn't change often.

wordpress.title: WordPress Websites
wordpress.body: Website development with WordPress, providing full control of the content without having to touch code. Ideal for medium-sized projects such as blogs, dynamic portfolios or product catalogs, offering flexibility and easy customization for businesses and entrepreneurs.

web-apps.title: Web Applications
web-apps.body: Custom web application development with advanced functionalities, such as online payment integration, personalized recommendation systems, live chat, real-time data analysis and content management. Perfect for medium to large projects, such as online stores, educational platforms, online booking systems, news portals, and business management systems (ERP, CRM).

consulting.title: Web Consulting
consulting.body: If you own a small business or are an entrepreneur looking to add new features or update your website, we’ll plan the whole process for you. From time estimates to budget planning, we provide you a clear path to improve your business engagement, delivering affordable and efficient plans that fits your business needs.

support.title: Web Support
support.body: If your website needs fixes or updates, our web support service keeps everything running smoothly. We correct errors, update content, handle plugins and hosting issues, and make sure your site stays secure and fast. With clear solutions and reliable support, you can focus on your business while we take care of the technical side.

optimization.title: Website Optimization
optimization.body: Our web optimization service makes your website faster, easier to use, and more visible online. We improve loading speed, mobile experience, and basic SEO so customers can find you quickly and enjoy browsing your site. With a smoother, more professional website, you’ll attract more visitors and turn them into clients.

button.aria_label: See more web development services for small businesses and entrepreneurs

technologies.title: Technologies we use to make engaging <keyword>websites</keyword>
technologies.subtitle: We are experts in state-of-the-art web development technology

clients.title: <keyword>Websites</keyword> we have worked in
clients.subtitle: Our biggest projects that we have build or improved

tailor.name: Guillermo Saez
tailor.body: With Bachacode Developers I found what many entrepreneurs are looking for and never find: The peace of mind of being able to leave your business in the hands of people who take care of it and help it grow with solutions that border on excellence. They provide ideas and are 100% involved with each project.

mesgo.name: Luis Fernando Carbajal
mesgo.body: Thanks to Bachacode Developers we were able to meet the requirements established by CBI Group to obtain our supplier number. The website they developed not only exceeded our expectations, but also facilitated the process and the presentation of our company.

team.subtitle: What benefits your business will get working with us

development.title: Agile Web Development for Small Businesses
development.body: Our agile web development for small businesses delivers fast, custom websites tailored to entrepreneurs' needs, ensuring efficiency and scalability.

communication.title: Clear Communication in Website Development Projects
communication.body: We prioritize transparent communication in website development, keeping entrepreneurs informed to ensure your small business website aligns perfectly with your vision.

prices.title: Affordable Web Development Pricing for Entrepreneurs
prices.body: Our affordable web development services offer flexible pricing for small businesses, delivering high-quality websites that fit your budget and drive growth.

flexible.title: Flexible Website Features for Growing Small Businesses
flexible.body: Customizable website features adapt to your small business needs, ensuring entrepreneurs get flexible, scalable web development solutions until launch.

cristhian.name: Cristhian Flores
cristhian.body: Experienced in developing interfaces and APIs with both frontend and backend knowledge.

josibel.name: Josibel Farias
josibel.body: Specializing in creating intuitive and engaging user experiences, with a focus on visual design and usability to ensure efficient and enjoyable interfaces.

metadata.title: About Us
metadata.description: Discover Bachacode Developers, innovative web development experts since 2021. Learn about our mission for high-quality, personalized digital solutions, ethical values, and skilled team including Fullstack Developers and UX/UI Designers committed to client success.

hero.title: About <keyword>Bachacode Developers</keyword>
hero.description: At Bachacode Developers, we are dedicated to providing innovative and high quality web development solutions. Our team of experts works tirelessly to ensure the satisfaction of our clients, providing personalized services tailored to the specific needs of each project.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Quality is our priority. We are committed to delivering products and services that exceed our customers' expectations.

commitment.title: Commitment

hero.subtitle: Tailored digital solutions to drive your success

services.title: Custom <keyword>Web Solutions</keyword> to Grow Your Business Online
services.subtitle: Customized solutions that transform your business

static.title: Static Websites
static.body: Custom website development with static content, ideal for small projects that do not require frequent updates, such as landing pages, portfolios or catalogs. These sites offer speed, security and efficiency for stable content.

wordpress.title: WordPress Websites
wordpress.body: Website development with WordPress, providing full control of the content without the need to touch code. Ideal for medium-sized projects such as blogs, portfolios or corporate sites, offering flexibility, scalability and easy customization.

web-apps.title: Web Applications
web-apps.body: Custom web application development with advanced functionalities, such as online payment integration, personalized recommendation systems, live chat, real-time data analysis and content management. Perfect for medium to large projects, such as online stores, educational platforms, online booking systems, news portals, and business management systems (ERP, CRM).

consulting.title: Web Consulting
consulting.body: If you want to add new functionalities or update your current project, we'll take care of planning the entire process for you. From time estimation to budget creation, we'll offer solutions using the technologies we know best, guaranteeing an efficient development according to your needs.

support.title: Web Support
support.body: When it comes to your existing project, we can help you with web support and correct any errors you find. We'll plan out the whole process, offering solutions in the technologies we know best to ensure the development is efficient and meets your specific needs.

optimization.title: Website Optimization
optimization.body: When it comes to your existing project, we can help you with web support and correct any errors you find. We'll plan out the whole process, offering solutions in the technologies we know best to ensure the development is efficient and meets your specific needs.

hosting.title: Professional Hosting
hosting.description: You will no longer have to worry about managing your own website, we will do it for you. We offer you a scalable hosting service that adapts to your needs.

design.title: Modern Designs
design.description: We take care of giving your website an attractive design that reflects what your business wants to convey. If you find this page attractive, you will get an equal or superior quality in your project!

security.title: Guaranteed Safety
security.description: Don't take unnecessary risks: our developers will take care of integrating all the necessary security measures to protect your website.

support.title: Effective Support
support.description: We are ready to attend any emergency that requires technical support, we guarantee to keep your website up and running 24 hours a day!

technologies.title: what technologies do we use?
technologies.subtitle: We work with the best technologies for your projects

hosting.title: Let us handle the <keyword>hosting</keyword> of your project
hosting.subtitle: Host your project with us and forget about technical problems

web.title: Web Hosting
web.description: Professional hosting designed for business owners who want secure, reliable, and optimized websites without the technical headaches.

multiple_websites.title: Host up to 5 websites
multiple_websites.description: Host up to 5 websites under one plan — ideal for a main site, landing pages, or an online store.

professional_email.title: Custom business email
professional_email.description: Get a custom email address with your domain name (you@yourbusiness.com) to look professional and trustworthy.

custom_php.title: PHP & HTML Support
custom_php.description: Support for HTML static websites and PHP applications, including WordPress

team_access.title: Secure team access
team_access.description: Grant secure access to employees or partners without sharing sensitive login details.

cloud.title: Cloud Hosting
cloud.description: Flexible and scalable hosting that combines the power of dedicated resources with the reliability of the cloud. Ideal for businesses that need consistent performance.

dedicated_resources.title: Dedicated resources
dedicated_resources.description: Guaranteed CPU, RAM, and storage reserved for your websites without sharing with other users.

auto_scaling.title: Automatic scaling
auto_scaling.description: Your hosting resources automatically scale up or down to handle traffic spikes or business growth.

flexible_stack.title: Flexible app stack
flexible_stack.description: Run different applications and frameworks beyond WordPress, including custom stacks tailored to your project.

high_concurrency.title: Handles high traffic
high_concurrency.description: Serve large numbers of visitors and transactions at the same time without losing performance.

metadata.title: Terms and Conditions
metadata.description: Bachacode Developers specializes in custom web development, offering static sites, web applications and WordPress, tailored to your needs.

identity.title: Identification of the Owner
identity.body: These Terms and Conditions govern the purchase and sale of the services provided by CRISTHIAN JOSÉ FLORES ASTUDILLO (hereinafter referred to as the “Owner”), a resident of Venezuela, who can be contacted via email at hola@bachacode.com, and who markets such services through the website https://bachacode.com (hereinafter referred to as the “Website”).

acceptance.title: Acceptance of the Terms and Conditions
acceptance.body:
By using the services of the Website, the user (hereinafter referred to as the “User” or “Users”) accepts these Terms and Conditions, which define the rights and obligations of the Owner and the User in relation to the professional relationship that may arise from the use of the services accessible through the Website. These are the only Terms and Conditions applicable to the use of the Website (without prejudice to the fact that certain services may be subject to additional terms) and to the engagement of services such as consultations, project management, project development, or related activities offered by the Owner. These Terms and Conditions supersede any other conditions.

The use of the Website and the services offered through it is prohibited for persons under 18 years of age. If it is determined that a minor is using the Website or attempting to engage with the services, the Owner will immediately restrict or deny such access.

purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.body:
The Website offers professional web development and consulting services, including but not limited to:
  • Custom static websites
  • WordPress-based websites
  • Custom web applications
  • Web consulting and strategic planning
  • Web support and maintenance
  • Website optimization (SEO, performance, and user experience)
    • The purpose of these general conditions is to regulate the provision of these Services to the Users.

use.title: Use of the Website
use.body:
The Users agree to make lawful, diligent, honest, and proper use of any information or content to which they have access through the Website, always acting in good faith and in compliance with the applicable laws and these Terms and Conditions.

The Owner reserves the right to restrict access to the Website to those Users who misuse it, engage in fraudulent acts, or carry out activities that may harm or attempt to harm the Owner.

If the Owner detects any anomaly or has reasonable grounds to believe that a User is engaging in fraudulent activities that contravene good faith and these Terms and Conditions, the Owner may restrict or block access to that User and, if applicable, take all corresponding legal actions.

The following activities are expressly prohibited:
  • Carrying out hacking, phishing, scraping, or any technique that compromises the security of the Website.
  • Accessing restricted areas without express authorization.
  • Distributing malware or interfering with the proper functioning of the Website.

data_protection.title: Data Protection
data_protection.body: The processing of personal data is carried out in accordance with the applicable data protection regulations, including international standards such as the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and, where applicable, the laws of the United States or other relevant jurisdictions. For more details, please refer to our <link>Privacy Policy</link>.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.body: This Website uses technical and analytical cookies. To learn about their purpose and how to manage them, please refer to our Cookie Policy, drafted in compliance with the applicable legal framework on electronic communications and online services.

intellectual_property.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual_property.body:
All contents of the Website (texts, images, designs, source code, trademarks, logos, etc.) are the property of the Owner or of third parties who have authorized their use. Their reproduction, distribution, or public communication without prior written authorization is expressly prohibited, in accordance with applicable intellectual property and trademark laws.

Accordingly, and under the provisions of national, international, and applicable intellectual property and industrial property regulations, the reproduction, transmission, adaptation, translation, distribution, public communication, including the provision of access to all or part of the contents of the Website, for purposes other than personal use by the User, in any medium and by any technical means, is expressly prohibited without prior written authorization from the Owner.

In particular, and in accordance with international standards on intellectual property, the use of all or part of the contents of this Website, and specifically content created by the Owner, for commercial purposes, in any medium and by any technical means, is expressly prohibited without the prior written authorization of the Owner.

The Owner does not grant any license or authorization of use of any kind over its intellectual and industrial property rights or over any other property or right related to the Website, except as provided in this clause, and under no circumstances shall it be understood that access and navigation by the Users implies a waiver, transfer, or total or partial assignment of said rights by the Owner.

Any unauthorized use of such contents by the User shall be considered a serious breach of the intellectual or industrial property rights of the Owner and shall give rise to the corresponding legal liabilities.

liability.title: Liability
liability.body:
The Owner does not grant any warranty and shall not be held liable, under any circumstances, for damages of any kind that may arise from access to or use of the contents or the Website, except in cases of willful misconduct or gross negligence on the part of the Owner. Without limitation, the Owner shall not be responsible for the following circumstances:
  • The lack of availability, maintenance, and proper functioning of the Website and/or its services or contents, excluding, to the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, any liability for damages that may result from interruptions or lack of continuity in the functioning of the Website, such as errors or delays in accessing the Website by the User, or any anomaly that may arise beyond the good faith of the Owner.
  • The lack of usefulness of the Website or its contents for any particular service or purpose.
  • The content of external websites that may be linked from the Website.
  • The existence of viruses, malicious programs, or harmful elements on the Website.
  • The unlawful, negligent, fraudulent, or bad-faith use of the Website or its contents by Users, including any infringement of the intellectual and/or industrial property rights of the Owner or third parties.
    • Under no circumstances shall the services offered through this Website be understood as guaranteeing specific results. Any reference to potential performance or outcomes shall not be interpreted as a warranty of results.

    In any case, the Owner undertakes to address issues that may arise and to provide all necessary support to the User in order to achieve a prompt and satisfactory resolution of any incident.

modifications.title: Modifications
modifications.body:
The information displayed on this Website is current as of the date of its last update. The Owner reserves the right to update, modify, or remove the information on this Website, as well as these Terms and Conditions, the Privacy Policy, or any other information, including the description or name of its services, for reasons of marketing, strategy, or any other circumstances deemed appropriate.

The modifications to these Terms and Conditions shall enter into force from the moment of their publication on this Website.

severability.title: Severability and Validity of Clauses
severability.body: If any clause included in these Terms and Conditions is declared, in whole or in part, null or invalid, such nullity or invalidity shall only affect that provision or the part of it that is null or invalid. The remaining clauses shall remain in full force and effect, and the affected provision, or the part of it that is invalid, shall be deemed not included.

exclusion.title: Right of Exclusion
exclusion.body: The Owner reserves the right to deny or withdraw access to the Website and/or the services offered, without prior notice and at its own discretion or at the request of a third party, from those Users who fail to comply with these Terms and Conditions.

law_jurisdiction.title: Applicable Law and Jurisdiction
law_jurisdiction.body: These Terms and Conditions shall be governed and interpreted in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which the Owner is legally established, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. In the event of any dispute, the parties expressly submit to the competent courts of that jurisdiction, unless otherwise provided by applicable mandatory law.
